name: playwright-framework
description: Playwright Automation Framework with POM and Allure Reporting

scripts.test: playwright test && npm run report:single || npm run report:single
scripts.report: allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
scripts.report:single: allure generate allure-results --single-file -o allure-report --clean && mv allure-report/index.html allure-report/complete.html
